name: Puzzle Blitz - Win Real Cash
description:
Welcome to the absorded puzzle world powered by Skillz™! Are you tired of the console puzzle game? Try puzzle blitz where you can not only challenge people around the world but also win real prizes.

FEATURES:
· An totally skill-based puzzle game
· Score by placing blocks and clearing rows or columns.
· Streak or combos to win more.
· Real prizes will give to the player who can get the higher score
· To ensure the fairness, players will get the same blocks sequence in the same round.
· You just get 3 minutes. Try to get the best score!
· Play practice mode to practice your skills and win more prize in cash mode.

MORE DETAILS:
*Prize tournaments are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.
